Plot: A psychoanalyst and his family go through profound emotional trauma when their son dies in a scuba diving accident.
Title: The Son's Room
Writer: Nanni Moretti (story), Linda Ferri (screenplay), Nanni Moretti (screenplay), Heidrun Schleef (screenplay)
Actors: Nanni Moretti, Laura Morante, Jasmine Trinca, Giuseppe Sanfelice
tomatoConsensus: The Son's Room is a moving and contemplative study of grief.
